sentences.cn: “ 介绍清楚一点, ” 医生说, “ 不要遗漏任何细节. ”

sentences.en: Be explicit when you talk about money with your family.
sentences.cn: 与家人谈钱的问题要直截了当。

sentences.en: Behind this explicit resolution there lay an implicit one.
sentences.cn: 这个明的决定背后还有个暗的决定.

sentences.en: Branagh says that it was his intention to make explicit in the film what was only implicit in the play.
sentences.cn: 布莱纳说他的用意是将剧本中的隐晦含意在电影中清晰明白地表现出来。

sentences.en: Criticism is hinted at, but never made explicit.
sentences.cn: 批评总是含沙射影，但从未明说。

sentences.en: He avoids the explicit answer to us.
sentences.cn: 他避免给我们明确的回答.

sentences.en: He gave me explicit directions on how to get there.
sentences.cn: 他清清楚楚地告诉我怎样到达那里.

sentences.en: His instructions about having the enclosed items delivered to you were explicit.
sentences.cn: 他明确指示把这些物件寄给您.

sentences.en: How explicit do I have to be?
sentences.cn: 我要讲得怎样露骨你才懂 呢 ?

sentences.en: Indeed, sometimes the warnings are quite explicit and concrete.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 有时这些警示相当明确具体.

sentences.en: She was quite explicit about why she left.
sentences.cn: 她对自己离去的原因直言不讳.

sentences.en: The contrast could not have been made more explicit.
sentences.cn: 这个对比再清楚不过了。

sentences.en: The electrostatic summation must be evaluated for an explicIt'set of ion position.
sentences.cn: 静电能的加和必须根据离子的具体位置来计算.

sentences.en: The kidnappers gave us explicit instructions not to involve the police.
sentences.cn: 绑匪明确告诉我们不许报警。

sentences.en: The lease is explicit in saying the rent must be paid by the 10 th of every month.
sentences.cn: 租约上说得明白,每月10号必须交租金.

sentences.en: This explains the retreat of explicit political statements to the editorial pages.
sentences.cn: 这就说明了为什么鲜明的政治言论退出了评论版.

sentences.en: Three hours earlier the two youths had been explicit in their request.
sentences.cn: 三个钟点以前,两个小伙子直截了当地提出了他们的要求.

sentences.en: Zhou was far too intelligent to make the Chinese dilemma explicit.
sentences.cn: 周氏何等聪明,岂能把中国的困境暴露于人前.

trans.tran_cn: 易于理解的，明确的，直言的
trans.tran_en: expressed in a way that is very clear and direct
